item.title: Growth Summary: 00 - 05
item.description: I started a newsletter almost one year ago, and I have really enjoyed doing that. It’s a great way to discuss and share insights on product engineering, leadership, and personnel growth. I’m also sharing articles, events, and any other interesting tidbits I find. Past editions aren’t available online, and while some parts may not be relevant (such as events), it would be interesting to summarize a few of them into a single blog post.
